name: com.unity.splines
description: Work with curves and paths. Use the Splines package to generate objects and behaviors along paths, create trajectories, and draw shapes.

samples.description: Example code and scenes files showing how to use Splines.

_upm.changelog:
### Bug Fixes

- [SPLB-208] Fixed a bug where `SplineToolContext` would attempt to draw empty Splines and flood the console with errors.
